oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Pioneer Rhythm Boys - WHFB - 1949-mm-dd
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pioneer Rhythm Boys radio show for station WHFB, Benton Harbor, MI. Original broadcast date unknown, possibly early December 1949 (unconfirmed). Featuring Mel Irving (announcer), Eddie Skates (host), and (verbally identified) band members Ray 'The Professor' Watkins, Rex Watkins, and Butch. Bud 'The Deacon' Wheeler is identified as not being present. Sponsored by Bill's Auto Service and Al's Grocery.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Pioneer Rhythm Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme -- Opening statement (Mel Irving) -- Opening statement (Eddie Skates) -- Candy Kisses -- Bill's Auto Service commercial (Mel Irving) -- Eddie Skates introduces Rex -- Galway Bay -- Eddie Skates introduces the Professor -- Wildwood Flower -- Al's Grocery Store commercial (Mel Irving) -- Eddie Skates introduces Rex -- Someday You'll Call My Name -- Eddie Skates introduces Butch -- I'm Throwing Rice (At The Girl That I Love) -- Theme -- Closing statement (Eddie Skates) -- Closing statement (Mel Irving)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WHFB (Radio station : Benton Harbor, Mich.); Pioneer Rhythm Boys
